definition: cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
lit. to pour cold water on/fig. to dampen one's enthusiasm
Lengshuijiang county level city in Loudi 婁底|娄底[Lou2 di3], Hunan
Lengshuijiang county level city in Loudi 婁底|娄底[Lou2 di3], Hunan
Lengshuitan district of Yongzhou city 永州市[Yong3 zhou1 shi4], Hunan
Lengshuitan district of Yongzhou city 永州市[Yong3 zhou1 shi4], Hunan
to pour cold water/fig. to discourage

sentences.english: It is the custom here to take a cold shower every evening in summer.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天每天傍晚洗冷水浴是这里的习俗。

sentences.english: It puts forward new demands to domestic energy efficiency chillers.
sentences.chinese: 这对国内冷水机组能效比的提高提出了新的要求。

sentences.english: Install a shutoff valve in the cold water inlet.
sentences.chinese: 在冷水进水管上安装一个关断阀。

sentences.english: He would notify colleagues before he stepped out to the water cooler.
sentences.chinese: 他出去到冷水机前都会告诉同事。

sentences.english: The ice storage tank provided by the invention is mainly applied to the evaporative supercooled water continuous ice-making system.
sentences.chinese: 本发明主要应用于蒸发式过冷水连续制冰系统。

sentences.english: Pea sprouts into boiling water, fish out the burns with cold water, or too cold.
sentences.chinese: 豌豆苗放入开水中烫过捞出，用冷水过凉。

sentences.english: Let's have a cold tub before breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我们在早饭前洗个冷水澡吧。

sentences.english: Hot massage for a while, and then use a spoon to stimulate it to soak in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 热按摩片刻后，再用一把泡在冷水里的匙子刺激该处。
排骨汆水后以冷水洗净备用。

sentences.english: Deflation can be long-lasting and have a chilling effect on stock markets.
sentences.chinese: 通货紧缩可能会持续很长时间，给股市浇上一盆冷水。

sentences.english: Bridget poured cold water on the idea of crossing the mountains in winter, pointing out all the difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 了所有的困难，对冬天越过丛山的主意泼了一瓢冷水。

sentences.english: To do this, you can put the cooking pot in cool water.
sentences.chinese: 为了达到这个效果，你可以将奶锅放到冷水中。

sentences.english: Rinse the cucumber with cold water, and drain on paper towels.
sentences.chinese: 用冷水将黄瓜丁冲净，用餐巾纸吸干净水分。

sentences.english: He gets used to taking cold baths in winter.
sentences.chinese: 他已习惯在冬天洗冷水澡。

sentences.english: No, I didn't do that either. I just washed it in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 没有，我也没那样做，我只用冷水洗了。

definition: Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
Yanshui town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
